attributes.action: ask the Queen to STRIP Robert Mugabe of his knighthood and to GIVE Morgan Tsvangirai a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Robert Mugabe was given an honorary knighthood (Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath) by Queen Elizabeth in 1994.

Robert Mugabe has been brutal to his people and has lied and cheated to remain in power.

Morgan Tsvangirai has been beaten up for the sake of his people. He is a kind and honest man. Morgan Tsvangirai should have a knighthood, NOT Robert Mugabe!
attributes.creator_name: Cllr James Alexander, Prospective MP for York Outer

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/mugabeskcb/
With regards to the knighthood for Morgan Tsvangirai, the Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
